participant_1.background:
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
I'm going to hike some of the Appalachian Trail with my dragon friend.
i m a simple man.
I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to the music of Katy Perry as it reminds me of my younger years.
I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family.
I love the website The Spruce because it has so many great tips for cleaning everything in my home, including my glasses!
i am afraid of the dark.
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.

content.text: Hey there! How is your evening going?
Hello! It is going well, thank you for asking! How is yours?
It is going pretty good. I just got back from a walk with my dog.
Dogs are great! I have a French bulldog. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He is a big ol' goofball.
I love golden retrievers! They are so friendly.
They are! He is the best dog I have ever had.
That is awesome! I am glad you have such a great companion.
Thank you! What do you like to do in your free time?
I enjoy listening to music, reading, and spending time with my family.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your free time!
They are! I am glad you enjoy your walks with your dog.
Thank you! I really do. They are a great way to relax and get some exercise.
I can imagine! I need to start taking my dog for more walks.
You should! It is good for both of you.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion
